name: Volcanic Field 2 TV
description: The earths crust has been weakened, and magma is  continuously flowing through its cracks.  Causing a serious amount pressure deep within the Earth.  The earth held on as long as it could; however, the pressure was just to great and magma has started bursting out of the Earth like never seen before. Causing the worst eruption in recorded history turning the earth into a absolute Volcanic Field. The highest level of Rescue services has hired you to gather the civilians and keep casualties to a minimum. Can you survive the Volcanic Field and protect the people?
